--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> As his second in command approached, Tyrael walked to meet him up.
> 
> Tyrael: We need to find out if we are at the right place. This means 
> that if the scans I asked are positive, we will raid one of the 
base. 
> Our objective here is not to eradicate our enemy, only to pinpoint 
> their position, if they are truly here. However, if I am right, 
there 
> should be two bases. We will divide our group and raid both bases at 
> the same time.

Burrock arrived soon enough. He took no time to transform to robot 
mode. His right arm consisted of the flailing tendrils that had ripped 
the pod in two. His left arm was normal looking. He stood only 8 feet 
up, but his strength was undeniable. What was more disturbing was the 
absence of eyes or optics sensors. The bot was blind.

Burrock: You Tyrael? Who's that guy?

Tyrael: Yes, I am Major Tyrael (he insisted on  the Major). This is 
Lieutenant Shadow Star, second in command of this group. We are the 
Tripredacus Strikers, and our mission here is to find and neutralize 
Megatron. We were about to mount a raid. I think you will function 
well with Shadow Star.

Burrock: Yeah, whatever. So, SS, whaddaya have to say about me going 
with your team?
